body.name: Magnet Toys for 3 Year Old Boys and Girls Magnetic Tiles Building Blocks STEM Learning Toys Sensory Montessori Toys for Toddlers Kids

features: 【STARTER SET OF 52PCS TOTAL】 Package includes 52 magnetic blocks, an idea booklet and a storage bag. Small castle kit for beginners who want to have a try for the first time or just as a refill pack for existing magnet tiles kit. More pieces, more possibilities.

【SAFE PLAY SENSORY TOYS】 High-quality ABS plastic, geomagnetic material, rainbow color, round edge geometry shapes without sharpness, no harm to skin and no swallow mistake. Just feel free to challenge! Great montessori toy gift for toddlers, 3+ year old boys and girls. And also parent approved sensory toys for kids with ADHD / ASDs.

【LEARNING WITH CREATIVE FUN】 Attractive transparent rainbow magnet toy set is designed as educational toys to help build kid's sense of creativity and get better understanding of color, geometrical shapes and develop motor skills and creative thinking. Great for spacial reasoning, architecture, STEM and STEAM.

【PERFECT BOREDOM BUSTERS & MEMORY MAKERS】 Keep these magnetic tiles in your special boredom buster cabinet. Every time your toddler say “I'm bored”, take them out and then he/she will pick an STEM activity to do for hours. We highly recommend parent-to-kid bonding play on weekends.

【SIMPLE STORAGE & KEEP FUN ON-THE-GO】 Stacking pieces stick together for easy cleanup, compact storage, and no more mess in your kids room. Comes with a portable pouch which is perfect for carry on-the-go and especially keeping hyperactive kids occupied on road trip.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Intellectual Capital Is The Best Investment! Parent Approve Sensory Toys for Kids with ADHD / ASDs Soyee magnetic blocks help foster brain development and creative thinking by giving kids and teens constructive ways to express themselves. Encourage creative thinking and help kids learn how to solve complex problems as they play. Learning to approach problems in a creative way is a skill that kids can use throughout their lives. Using this magnetic building sets to enhance these skills allows kids to grow in a way that is fun and enriching.
Translucent, brightly colored and basic geometric shapes easily connect for open-ended, constructive play!

Children of all ages develop math, science, and fine motor skills while having fun. Design flat, 2-D patterns or build in 3-D! Children become familiar with 2-D, 3-D shapes, and math concepts learned in school.

About Soyee Soyee is a toy manufacturer, design and produce qualified toys for children of many developmental stages. Soyee toys are in accordance with international safety standards, and will be your wonderful investment for kids that will last for many, many years. Open-ended-play Soyee Tiles are open ended so there is no right or wrong way to play with them, meaning children will be using their imagination to create with them as they take the lead in their own play. CompatibleShape/Color RecognitionInterpersonal SkillsHand-eye CoordinationLogical & Spatial ThinkingMore talents ...

Great Gift Idea Frustration free packaging for gift purpose on birthday or holidays. Premim Plastic and Well-made Made of premium BPA-free plastic, toxin-free and durable. Smooth edges without burrs, no harm to little hands. Attractive Translucent Feature Build with Soyee Magnetic Tiles against the window, or add a flashlight at night, see how the tile buildings become a fantacy light catcher. Color Blending Fun Learn more about color and enjoy the magic color blending fun!
Spend time with your little ones and have the most fun possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for all ages
reviews.reviewText: There are lots of off-brand magnetic tiles available - I'm sure not all are equal but I am very happy with these. The magnets are strong and the plastic sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how heavy each box was when they arrived. I purchased two of these as gifts for children's church, but my 8 year old granddaughter saw them and begged for one! I insisted they were for gifts, but ended up wrapping one of them for her. She LOVED it, and told me yesterday that she plays with it all the time. She is very creative, and this keeps her busy on something other than computer games! She can be pretty hard on her toys, so I assume they are both sturdy and durable to endure hours of her imagination! ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just wish I paid more attention to the QTY
reviews.reviewText: This product is awesome and a great price for what it is. I highly recommend buying the larger quantity though as the smaller one I got really isn't a whole lot, however, it still provides entertainment for my son and he enjoys it which was the goal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy building pieces. Kids play for hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Fun, Brought back good childhood memoires.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my sister, I saw it online and remembered as a kid using it and having so much fun. She loves it and builds all sorts of things with her hands. a lot better than using some sort of screen or electronic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This picture is deceptive
reviews.reviewText: First of all, just show how many tiles come in the product not 8 of them combined. Misleading. The tiles are nice but there’s not very many in the package for the full price. Luckily I bought them on a cyber deal but even that value is questionable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute siblings loved it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for Christmas and my little brother went crazy with it he hasn’t stopped playing with them since and they’re durable since he throws them all the time. The colors are pigmented and the magnets are great !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 5 year old as a Christmas gift. He loves them! Great quality magnets hold well! They have withstood alot of dropping so far. Will probably buy more. They come with a bag to put them in too!
